page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JOANNE
page.content: I get up at about 8.00, this is not very early but I only live 7 doors away from school. My sister Nicky always seems to get to the bathroom before me and she takes ages to get washed. Eventually I get washed and have my breakfast. At about 8.50 I go back upstairs and put some makeup on, brush my teeth and set of for school at about 8.58. At school we have registration and then start lessons such as Art, Theology, Maths and PE. PE is my favorite lesson as I enjoy sport. During the breaks my sisters (I am a triplet) and I run the House block tuckshop. At 3.40 I go home and Dad makes our tea then at about 6.30 my sisters (Nicky and Elaine)and I go to training at Hull Spartans Athletic Club until about 8.30. We go home tired from training watch TV have a bath and go to bed at about 11.oo.
